mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM,ROWNUM,BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_REPLY_STATUS,TO_CHAR(BOARD_REGISTRATION_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BOARD_REGISTRATION_DATE FROM USER_INQUIRY_BOARD WHERE USER_ID=#{param1} ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_INQUIRY_BOARD WHERE BOARD_NUM=#{param1} AND USER_ID=#{param2}
